meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lyndia Lowy Sally Cassil Mary Hirschfeld Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2733.

td.p: Lyndia Lowy, a secretary from Los Angeles, California
Sally Cassil, a librarian from Santa Fe, New Mexico
Mary Hirschfeld, a professor of economics originally from Pullman, Washington (whose 2-day cash winnings total $31,202)

tr.td: ALICE IN WONDERLAND
HISPANIC HOLLYWOOD
GIFTS
HISTORIC AMERICANS
COMMON BONDS
"M" ON THE MAP
